ajxpdriver.name: s3
ajxpdriver.label: CONF_MESSAGE[S3 (Amazon Web Service)]
ajxpdriver.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Access an AWS server. Requires AWS-SDK v2 for PHP]

param.name: REGION
param.choices: us-east-1|US Standard (Virginia),us-west-1|US West 1 (Northern California),us-west-2|US West 2 (Oregon),eu-west-1|EU (Ireland),eu-central-1|EU (Frankfurt - signature v4 only), ap-southeast-2|South-East (Sydney), ap-southeast-1|South-East (Singapore),ap-northeast-1|Asia Pacific (Japan),ap-northeast-2|Asia Pacific (Seoul - signature v4 only),sa-east-1|South America (Sao Paulo),us-gov-west-1|EU Governement Cloud
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Region]

param.name: CONTAINER
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Container]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Root container in the S3 storage]

param.name: PATH
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Inner Path]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Path of the data inside the container. Empty value points to the root of the container. You can use dynamic keywords here.]

param.name: SIGNATURE_VERSION
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Signature Version]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[API Signature Version. Leave empty if you are not sure, EU Frankfurt and AP Seoul should use v4 only.]

param.name: API_VERSION
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[API Version]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[The API Version of AS3 is a date (like 2006-03-01). If not sure, put latest ]

param.name: PROXY
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Proxy]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If you are using a proxy, for example: 127.0.0.1:80 or username:password@127.0.0.1:8080]

param.name: STORAGE_URL
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Storage URL]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Replace default AWS access points (built from region). Set a full URL, including protocol]

param.name: S3_FOLDER_EMPTY_FILE
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Empty folders file]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Create a hidden file when creating folder]

param.name: IS_VIPR
param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Is ViPR]
param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[If the backend storage is an EMC ViPR storage]
